backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing inquiries in a map with submit, list, lookup, and filter functions.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report describing a feature request to update footer contact info and listing related files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend components and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component assembling Header, Hero, About, Services, Contact, and Footer sections.
frontend/src/components/site/ContactSect: Section with inquiry form, validation, submission logic, and status handling.
frontend/src/components/site/Footer.tsx: Footer showing brand info, quick links, and owner contact details with icons.
frontend/src/components/site/Header.tsx: Sticky header with logo, desktop navigation, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/site/HeroSection: Hero banner with headline, description, Call-to-Action buttons, and hero image.
frontend/src/components/site/InquiryList: Expandable debug panel that fetches and displays inquiry records in a table using useInquiryList.
frontend/src/components/site/ProductCate: Renders a grid of product category cards with titles and item lists.
frontend/src/components/site/ScrollToSec: Anchor-like component that smoothly scrolls to a target section on click or keypress.
frontend/src/components/site/Section.tsx: Wrapper component for page sections adding consistent padding and container layout.
frontend/src/components/site/ServicesSec: Displays service cards with icons and descriptions and includes the ProductCategories section.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor bound to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInquiryList.ts: Fetches all inquiries from the backend actor with react-query when enabled.
Validates form data and submits an inquiry through the backend actor, tracking status and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading, login, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/serviceInterest.ts: Maps service interest values between frontend options and backend enums and returns labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, query client, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, defining content paths, extending theme colors, typography, animations, and loading typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features and requirements for a responsive NK SYSTECH business website with pages, services, products, theme, contact form, and assets.
